timeline.bodyText: This works, but is a roundabout way of making sure the event loop has completed the runnable. Would it be better to Create a single EventLoop and pass that as the boss+worker EventLoopGroup to the NettyServer constructor? Then you can submit() your own Runnable and await its completion. We could use that same EventLoop for all the tests, really, if you'd prefer a @BeforeClass/@AfterClass to manage its lifetime.
